artifacts.summary: Research on CoherentBundle structure design, analyzing mutual coherence patterns, Zorn's lemma usage, and the constant-family approach to sidestep Lindenbaum control problems

partial_progress.details: Research report complete with recommendations for CoherentBundle structure, UnionBoxContent, and saturation approach

summary: Research complete. CoherentBundle should enforce mutual coherence via UnionBoxContent spanning all families. Key insight: restrict to constant families (all witnesses are constant) to avoid time-mismatch issues. The completed diamond_boxcontent_consistent_constant theorem provides the foundation. Proposed structure includes all_constant constraint, MutuallyCoherent predicate, and saturation via Zorn's lemma.
